H0.text: What is the official summer sport of Canada. Hockey

H1.text: What is the official summer sport of Canada. Baseball

H2.text: What is the official summer sport of Canada. Soccer

H3.text: What is the official summer sport of Canada. Lacross

A4.text: Bill Câ€“212 was passed to recognize hockey as Canada's official winter game, and lacrosse as its summer game.

A5.text: In 1994 Parliament passed the National Sports of Canada Act which declared lacrosse to be 'Canada's National Summer Sport', with ice hockey as 'Canada's National Winter Sport'.
